00028 #define NUM_DOTS 20

00030 SnpModelDb::SnpModelDb() {
00031     m_Stmt = NULL;
00032 }
00033 
00034 SnpModelDb::SnpModelDb(const std::string &fileName) {
00035     m_Stmt = NULL;
00036     open(fileName);
00037 }
00038 
00039 SnpModelDb::~SnpModelDb() {
00040     m_Db.close();
00041     if (m_Stmt != NULL) {
00042         sqlite3_finalize(m_Stmt);
00043     }
00044 }
00045 
00046 void SnpModelDb::open(const std::string &fileName) {
00047     if (m_Stmt != NULL) {
00048         sqlite3_finalize(m_Stmt);
00049     }
00050     m_Db.close();
00051     m_Db.open(fileName);
00052 }
00053 
00054 void SnpModelDb::close() {
00055     m_Db.close();
00056 }

00058 bool SnpModelDb::isSqlModelFile(const std::string &file) {
00059     bool isSqlModel = false;
00060     try {
00061         SQLiteDatabase db;
00062         db.open(file);
00063         SQLiteRecordset rset(db);
00064         string sql = "select count(*) from snp_model;";
00065         rset.open(sql);
00066         isSqlModel = true;
00067         rset.close();
00068         db.close();
00069         isSqlModel = true;
00070     }
00071     //catch (SQLiteException &e) {    
00072     catch (SQLiteException &) {
00073         // Nothing to do here we've already guessed false
00074     }
00075     return isSqlModel;
00076 }

00078 void SnpModelDb::getMetaValue(const std::string &key, std::vector<std::string> &values) const {
00079     values.clear();
00080     SQLiteRecordset rset(m_Db);
00081     string sql = "select value from snp_model_meta where key = '" + key + "';";
00082     rset.open(sql);
00083     while (rset.fetch()) {
00084         values.push_back(rset.getString(0));
00085     }
00086     rset.close();
00087 }

00089 void SnpModelDb::snpDistFromRSet(SQLiteRecordset &rset, snp_labeled_distribution &snp) const {
00090     int index = 0;
00091     snp.probeset_id = rset.getString(index++);
00092     snp.Dist.aa.m = rset.getDouble(index++);
00093     snp.Dist.aa.k = rset.getDouble(index++);
00094     snp.Dist.aa.ss = rset.getDouble(index++); 
00095     snp.Dist.aa.v = rset.getDouble(index++);
00096     snp.Dist.aa.ym = rset.getDouble(index++);
00097     snp.Dist.aa.yss = rset.getDouble(index++);
00098     snp.Dist.aa.xyss = rset.getDouble(index++);
00099 
00100     snp.Dist.ab.m = rset.getDouble(index++);
00101     snp.Dist.ab.k = rset.getDouble(index++);
00102     snp.Dist.ab.ss = rset.getDouble(index++); 
00103     snp.Dist.ab.v = rset.getDouble(index++);
00104     snp.Dist.ab.ym = rset.getDouble(index++);
00105     snp.Dist.ab.yss = rset.getDouble(index++);
00106     snp.Dist.ab.xyss = rset.getDouble(index++);
00107 
00108     snp.Dist.bb.m = rset.getDouble(index++);
00109     snp.Dist.bb.k = rset.getDouble(index++);
00110     snp.Dist.bb.ss = rset.getDouble(index++); 
00111     snp.Dist.bb.v = rset.getDouble(index++);
00112     snp.Dist.bb.ym = rset.getDouble(index++);
00113     snp.Dist.bb.yss = rset.getDouble(index++);
00114     snp.Dist.bb.xyss = rset.getDouble(index++);
00115 }
00116 
00117 bool SnpModelDb::getSnpDistribution(const std::string &probesetName, int copynumber, snp_labeled_distribution &snp) const {
00118     SQLiteRecordset rset(m_Db);
00119     snp.probeset_id.clear();
00120     snp.Dist.Clear();
00121     string key = copynumber == 1 ? probesetName + ":" + ToStr(copynumber) : probesetName;
00122     // Better be in right order...
00123     string sql = "select * from snp_model where probeset_name = '" + key + "'";
00124     rset.open(sql);
00125     bool found = false;
00126     while (rset.fetch()) {
00127         if (found) {
00128             Err::errAbort("Multiple models for snp: " + probesetName + " copynumber: " + ToStr(copynumber));
00129         }
00130         snpDistFromRSet(rset, snp);
00131         found = true;
00132     }
00133     return found;
00134 }
00135 
00136 void SnpModelDb::addMeta(const std::string &key, const std::string &value) {
00137 
00138     std::string escapedValue = value;
00139         std::string escapedKey = key;
00140     std::string quote("'");
00141     std::string twoQuotes("''");
00142     Util::replaceString(escapedValue, quote, twoQuotes);
00143         Util::replaceString(escapedKey, quote, twoQuotes);
00144         string sql = "insert into snp_model_meta values ('" + escapedKey + "','" + escapedValue + "');";
00145     try {
00146         m_Db.execute(sql);
00147     }
00148     catch (SQLiteException &e) {
00149         APT_ERR_ABORT("Got Exception at inserting meta - sql: " + sql + ". message: " + e.getMessage());
00150     }
00151 }
00152 
00153 void SnpModelDb::prepareToWriteModels(int numExpected) {
00154     unsigned int dotMod = Max(int(numExpected/NUM_DOTS), 1);
00155     try {
00156         m_Db.execute("begin;");
00157         Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Preparing models", NUM_DOTS, dotMod, numExpected);
00158         const char *sql = "insert into snp_model values ( :id, :aamean , :aak, :aavar, :aavark, :aaym, :aayvar, :aacov, "
00159             " :abmean , :abk, :abvar, :abvark, :abym, :abyvar, :abcov,  " 
00160             " :bbmean , :bbk, :bbvar, :bbvark, :bbym, :bbyvar, :bbcov  );";
00161         int sqlMsg = sqlite3_prepare_v2(&m_Db.getConnection(), sql, -1, &m_Stmt, NULL);
00162         if (m_Stmt == NULL || sqlMsg != SQLITE_OK) {
00163             APT_ERR_ABORT("Couldn't create prepared statement (code: " + ToStr(sqlMsg) + ")");
00164         }
00165     }
00166     catch (SQLiteException &e) {
00167         APT_ERR_ABORT("Got Exception at preparing statement. message: " + e.getMessage());
00168     }
00169 }
00170 
00171 void SnpModelDb::writeSnpDistribution(const snp_labeled_distribution &p) {
00172     int index = 1;
00173     try {
00174         Verbose::progressStep(1);
00175         sqlite3_reset(m_Stmt);
00176         sqlite3_bind_text(m_Stmt, index++, p.probeset_id.c_str(), p.probeset_id.length(), SQLITE_TRANSIENT);
00177         
00178         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.aa.m);
00179         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.aa.k);
00180         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.aa.ss); 
00181         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.aa.v);
00182         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.aa.ym);
00183         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.aa.yss);
00184         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.aa.xyss);
00185         
00186         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.ab.m);
00187         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.ab.k);
00188         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.ab.ss); 
00189         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.ab.v);
00190         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.ab.ym);
00191         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.ab.yss);
00192         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.ab.xyss);
00193         
00194         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.bb.m);
00195         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.bb.k);
00196         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.bb.ss); 
00197         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.bb.v);
00198         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.bb.ym);
00199         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.bb.yss);
00200         sqlite3_bind_double(m_Stmt, index++, p.Dist.bb.xyss);
00201         int sqlMsg = sqlite3_step(m_Stmt);
00202         APT_ERR_ASSERT( sqlMsg == SQLITE_DONE, "Error executing prepared statement (code " + ToStr(sqlMsg) +")");
00203     }
00204     catch (SQLiteException &e) {
00205         APT_ERR_ABORT("Got Exception at inserting snp: " + p.probeset_id + " message: " + e.getMessage());
00206     }
00207 }
00208 
00209 void SnpModelDb::doneWriteModels() {
00210     try {
00211         int sqlMsg = sqlite3_finalize(m_Stmt);
00212         APT_ERR_ASSERT( sqlMsg == SQLITE_OK, "Error finalizing statement (code " + ToStr(sqlMsg) +")");
00213         m_Stmt = NULL;
00214         m_Db.execute("end;");
00215         string createIndex = "create index snp_models_idx on snp_model (probeset_name);";
00216         m_Db.execute(createIndex);
00217         Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
00218     }
00219     catch (SQLiteException &e) {
00220         APT_ERR_ABORT("Got Exception at preparing statement. message: " + e.getMessage());
00221     }
00222 }
00223 
00224 void SnpModelDb::setupTables() {
00225     try {
00226         string dropExisting = "drop table if exists snp_model_meta;";
00227         m_Db.execute(dropExisting);
00228         dropExisting = "drop table if exists snp_model;";
00229         m_Db.execute(dropExisting);
00230         string createMetaTable = 
00231             "create table snp_model_meta ( "
00232             "key text, "
00233             "value text "
00234             ");";
00235         m_Db.execute(createMetaTable);
00236         string createIndex = "create index snp_models_meta_idx on snp_model_meta (key);";
00237         m_Db.execute(createIndex);
00238         
00239         string createDataTable = 
00240             "create table snp_model ( "
00241             "probeset_name text, " 
00242             "aa_x_mean numeric, "
00243             "aa_x_mean_k numeric, "
00244             "aa_x_var  numeric, "
00245             "aa_x_var_k numeric, "
00246             "aa_y_mean numeric, "
00247             "aa_y_var numeric, "
00248             "aa_xy_covar numeric, "
00249             "ab_x_mean numeric, "
00250             "ab_x_mean_k numeric, "
00251             "ab_x_var  numeric, "
00252             "ab_x_var_k numeric, "
00253             "ab_y_mean numeric, "
00254             "ab_y_var numeric, "
00255             "ab_xy_covar numeric, "
00256             "bb_x_mean numeric, "
00257             "bb_x_mean_k numeric, "
00258             "bb_x_var  numeric, "
00259             "bb_x_var_k numeric, "
00260             "bb_y_mean numeric, "
00261             "bb_y_var numeric, "
00262             "bb_xy_covar numeric "
00263             ");";
00264         m_Db.execute(createDataTable);
00265     }
00266     catch (SQLiteException &e) {
00267         APT_ERR_ABORT("Got Exception at creating databases. message: " + e.getMessage());
00268     }
00269 }
